Life Solina - The Royal Archives of Aden:
Sermons Ssoliny agitated the minds of his subjects, and the Emperor considered it dangerous to the existence of the state. Soon the royal guards were ordered to find Elmoreden Solin and take her into custody, along with her ​​students. Monastic army led by Anais and other soldiers from the Solina followers fought bravely, but were defeated.
Solin gave imperial troops with usloviyaem that they are not moved by her followers. The process lasted exactly one week. Solin was convicted of treason and sentenced to death. The execution took place the following day in the presence of Emperor Frintezy a large gathering of people.
